game.title: The Lost Artifacts
game.objective: Find and return the lost artifacts
game.description: Your mission, should you choose to accept, is to find the lost artifacts that were stolen from the royal palace. The king has promised a handsome reward to anyone who can return them.

task.description: The map will give you clues as to the location of the artifacts. It was last seen with old man Jenkins at the tavern.
Use the map and the clues it contains to find the location of the artifacts. Be warned, they are heavily guarded.
Once you have the artifacts, return them to King Harold for your reward.
